fi.left2die.ui
Class KeySelector

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.ui.KeySelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject
public class KeySelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameObject

Component is used to customize key bindings of the left2die game. User interface component that is used with the slick2d library.

Author:
TeeMuki
